definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: scrape out (NH id., scrape or draw off, out (bread from oven));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הַדְּבָָשׁ]] ´[[ר]]: Ju Jdg 14:9 b out of the carcass he scraped the honey (v. GFM); sf. [[וַיִרְדֵּהוּ אֶל־כַפָּיו]] v:Jdg 14:9 a he scraped it out into his palms; Buhl:Lex Du also [[עַל־יְדֵיהֶם]] Je 5:31, sc. gifts, money, fig. for making gain (most I. [[רדה]] q.v.).
